definition: unable to control oneself/to be beside oneself
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: I just can't resist the temptation to get on and follow to whatever destination.
sentences.chinese: 那種坐上去，前往未知的目的地的誘惑讓我不能自已。

sentences.english: On thinking about the holiday, I can't help being quite excited.
sentences.chinese: 放假，我的激動之情就不能自已。

sentences.english: Souls can't help the heavy heart, so we can't control our feelings.
sentences.chinese: 靈魂已提不起沉重的心，所以我們不能自已。

sentences.english: The problem was, she had to keep washing her hair.
sentences.chinese: 她不能自已的洗她的頭髮。

definition: cannot control oneself (idiom)/to be beside oneself
tears and mucus flowing profusely/sniveling/in a tragic state
eyes brimming with tears of excitement (idiom)/extremely moved
lit. liver and guts cut to pieces (idiom)/fig. grief-stricken
all sorts of feelings well up in one's heart
to bury one's head in one's hands and weep (idiom)
to not know the reason/to not know what to do
lit. to feel as if one's intestines have been cut short/broken-hearted (idiom)
